Reviews.Content: Cheap for Tokyo       Front of hotel
Reviews.Author: KLK111

Reviews.Content: Great Location- Not much else Great Location for a short stay- would not want to be there more than 1-2 nights as:very small rooms--probably average for japan standards.Classified as a business hotel.Value for money was very good...under $100AUd for 1 nights stay.very close to Shinjuku station- about 5 mins walk.very close to heaps of resturants and nightlife area of shinjuku.Decor is very dated, but clean.Bathrooms are very small but serviceable.The pics on the website are a true representation of what it is like.
Reviews.Author: travelforsnow
